channel.description: Find Command Search files and display the full path. Execute command on search results. Different search criteria name part name ownership owning group permissions inode number last access modification time in days or minutes size file type Command syntax {find} + {path} + {search option} + {action} Options -name / -iname (search by name) -user / -group (UID / GID) -perm (permissions) -inum (inode) -atime/amin (access time) -mtime/amin (modification time) -size / -type (size / type) Action copy, erase, rename, change ownership, modify permissions -exec {} \; replaces {} for each filename as it is found. The semicolon character (;) marks the termination of the command and it is escaped with the backslash character (\). -ok {} \; same as exec but requires confirmation. -delete -print <- default
